A4.text: In the 2001 NFL draft, the Falcons orchestrated a trade with the San Diego Chargers, acquiring the first overall pick (which was used on quarterback Michael Vick)

A5.text: In 2004, a new head coach, Jim L. Mora, was hired and Vick returned for the full season
